data.chText: （建筑物、城镇等的）地点，位置，建筑工地
data.enText: a place where a building, town, etc. was, is or will be located

data.chText: 一座十六世纪的修道院的旧址
data.enText: the site of a sixteenth century abbey

data.chText: 在建筑工地工作
data.enText: to work on a building/construction site

data.chText: 已为新学校选了校址。
data.enText: A site has been chosen for the new school.

data.chText: 所有材料都已运抵工地，可以立即开工。
data.enText: All the materials are on site so that work can start immediately.

data.chText: 现场；发生地；场所
data.enText: a place where sth has happened or that is used for sth

data.chText: 战场
data.enText: the site of the battle

data.chText: 考古现场
data.enText: an archaeological site

data.chText: 营地；旅行拖车停车点
data.enText: a camping/caravan site

data.chText: 网站；站点
data.enText: a place on the Internet where a company, an organization, a university, etc. puts information

data.chText: 使坐落在；为…选址
data.enText: to build or place sth in a particular position

data.chText: 已开会讨论了新学校的选址。
data.enText: There was a meeting to discuss the siting of the new school.

data.chText: 城堡坐落在高高的悬崖，十分壮观。
data.enText: The castle is magnificently sited high up on a cliff.

data.text: place ♦ site ♦ position ♦ location ♦ scene ♦ spot ♦ venue

data.chText: 以上各词均表示地点、场所、位置。
data.enText: These are all words for a particular area or part of an area, especially one used for a particular purpose or where sb/sth is situated or happens.
place

data.chText: 指有特定用途或事情发生的地点、场所、城镇、建筑物、地方：
data.enText: a particular point, area, city, town, building, etc., especially one used for a particular purpose or where a particular thing happens

data.chText: 这可是个野餐的好地方。
data.enText: This would be a good place for a picnic.
site

data.chText: 尤指建筑物的地点、位置，事情发生或有特定用途的地点、场所：
data.enText: the place where sth, especially a building, is or will be situated; a place where sth happened or that is used for a particular purpose

data.chText: 他们为新学校选了校址。
data.enText: They've chosen a site for the new school.
position

data.chText: 指位置、方位、恰当的位置：
data.enText: the place where a person or thing is situated; the place where sb/sth is meant to be

data.chText: 他在山头那个位置可以俯瞰海港。
data.enText: From his position at the top of the hill, he could see the harbour.

data.chText: position指人／物所处的位置常常是暂时性的，即在某段时间所在的位置。
data.enText: The position of sb/sth is often temporary: the place where sb/sth is at a particular time.
location

data.chText: 指事情发生或存在的地方、地点、位置，尤指无名或鲜为人知的地方：
data.enText: a place where sth happens or exists, especially a place that is not named or not known

data.chText: 公司准备迁移新址。
data.enText: The company is moving to a new location.
scene

data.chText: 尤指不愉快事件发生的地点、现场：
data.enText: a place where sth happens, especially sth unpleasant

data.chText: 事故现场
data.enText: the scene of the accident
spot

data.chText: 尤指具有某种特点或某一事件发生的地点、场所：
data.enText: a particular point or area, especially one that has a particular character or where sth particular happens

data.chText: 这湖是当地的一个风景点。
data.enText: The lake is one of the local beauty spots .
venue

data.chText: 指演出、体育比赛等的聚会地点、场馆、会场
data.enText: the place where people meet for an organized event such as a performance or sports event
a/the place/site/position/location/scene of sth
at a/the place/site/position/location/scene/spot/venue
in a place/position/location/venue
the place/site/location/spot/venue where…
the right place/site/position/location/spot/venue
a prime/central place/site/position/location/venue
the/sb's/sth's current/present/exact/precise place/site/position/location/spot/venue

means: (建筑物、城镇等的)地点，位置，建筑工地

ex.chText: 把钱放在安全的地方。
ex.enText: Put your money in a safe place.

ex.chText: 巴西面积很大。
ex.enText: Brazil is a big place.

ex.chText: 早先这里是一片不毛之地。
ex.enText: The place used to be a stretch of barren land.

ex.chText: 那家酒吧是我们碰面的老地方。
ex.enText: The bar was our usual meeting place.

ex.chText: 这是个观光游览的好地方。
ex.enText: This is a great place for sightseeing.

synonyms.bx: 普通用词，既可以指比较笼统的地方，又可以指某一具体的地点。

ex.chText: 他用笔在地图上标出了合恩角的位置。
ex.enText: He indicated the location of Cape Horn with a pen on the map.

ex.chText: 谁也不知道藏宝地点在哪里。
ex.enText: No one knows the location of the hidden treasure.

ex.chText: 我们将在指定的时间和地点见面。
ex.enText: We'll meet at a given time and location.

ex.chText: 救援人员需要知道飞机失事的确切地点。
ex.enText: The rescue workers needed the precise location of the crash.

ex.chText: 她想租一间位置很好的公寓。
ex.enText: She wants to rent an apartment in a really good location.

synonyms.bx: 尤指相对于其他建筑物、地区等而言某人或某物所处的地理位置。

ex.chText: 你能在这幅地图上找到我们学校的位置吗？
ex.enText: Can you find the position of our school on this map?

ex.chText: 学院靠着河，处于很好的位置。
ex.enText: The college is in a good position by the river.

ex.chText: 他在阳台上能够看到不错的海景。
ex.enText: From his position on the balcony, he had a good view of the sea.

ex.chText: 他在报告中重点强调了那个小岛的战略位置。
ex.enText: He emphasized the strategic position of that island in his report.

synonyms.bx: 指某人、某物相对于其他人、物或地方而言所处的方位。

ex.chText: 警察几分钟后就赶到了事发现场。
ex.enText: The police were on the scene within minutes.

ex.chText: 调查人员正在案发现场寻找线索。
ex.enText: Investigators are searching for clues at the scene of the crime.

synonyms.bx: 多指事故、罪案等不愉快事件发生的地点。

ex.chText: 滑铁卢战役的战场遗址在比利时。
ex.enText: The site of the battle of Waterloo is in Belgium.

ex.chText: 这家酒吧建在一个古代竞技场的遗址上。
ex.enText: The bar is built on the site of an ancient arena.

ex.chText: 他们在营地上搭起了帐篷。
ex.enText: They pitched their tent at the camping site.

ex.chText: 他们接到命令为基地建一处直升机降落场。
ex.enText: They were ordered to build a helicopter landing site for their base.

synonyms.bx: 既可指发生过重要或有趣事件的场所，也可指有专门用途的场地。

ex.chText: 海滩上有没有一个安静点儿的地方？
ex.enText: Is there a quiet spot on the beach?

ex.chText: 位于恬静宜人之处的一幢小村舍深深吸引了她。
ex.enText: She was deeply attracted by a small cottage in an idyllic spot.

ex.chText: 为什么你觉得这是野餐的理想地点呢？
ex.enText: Why do you think this is an ideal spot for a picnic?

ex.chText: 这就是他遇害的确切地点。
ex.enText: This is the exact spot where he was killed.

ex.chText: 颐和园是我们野餐的最佳地点。
ex.enText: The Summer Palace is the best spot for our picnic.

synonyms.bx: 指相对范围较小的特定地点，尤指休闲场所。

tr: a computer connected to the internet that maintains a series of web pages on the World Wide Web
example: the Israeli web site was damaged by hostile hackers

tr: physical position in relation to the surroundings
example: the sites are determined by highly specific sequences of nucleotides

tr: the piece of land on which something is located (or is to be located)
example: a good site for the school
The company located some of their agents in Los Angeles

value.def: A site is a piece of ground that is used for a particular purpose or where a particular thing happens.

example.ex: He became a hod carrier on a building site.
example.tran: 他在建筑工地上当起了小工。

example.ex: ...a bat sanctuary with special nesting sites...
example.tran: 专门辟出了筑巢处的蝙蝠禁猎区

value.def: The site of an important event is the place where it happened.

example.ex: Scientists have described the Aral sea as the site of the worst ecological disaster on earth...
example.tran: 科学家把咸海描述成地球上最严重的生态灾难发生地。

example.ex: Plymouth Hoe is renowned as the site where Drake played bowls before tackling the Spanish Armada.
example.tran: 普利茅斯高地是德雷克在打败西班牙无敌舰队之前玩木球游戏的旧址，因此广为人知。

value.def: A site is a piece of ground where something such as a statue or building stands or used to stand.

example.ex: ...the Church of the Holy Sepulchre in Jerusalem, which is regarded by some as Christianity's holiest site.
example.tran: 耶路撒冷圣墓教堂——一些人眼中基督教最神圣的地方

value.tran: (建造房屋等的)地皮，地基，遗址

value.def: A site is the same as a website .
If something is sited in a particular place or position, it is put there or built there.

example.ex: He said chemical weapons had never been sited in Germany.
example.tran: 他声称从未在德国部署过化学武器。

example.ex: ...a damp, old castle, romantically sited on a river estuary.
example.tran: 坐落在河湾之上的一座阴冷潮湿的古城堡，仿佛传奇中描述的一般

example.ex: ...controls on the siting of gas storage vessels.
example.tran: 储气罐存放地点的管制

value.def: If someone or something is on site, they are in a particular area or group of buildings where people work, study, or stay.

example.ex: It is cheaper to have extra building work done when the builder is on site.
example.tran: 建筑工在现场干活时，让他额外做工的话工钱会便宜一些。

value.def: If someone or something is off site, they are away from a particular area or group of buildings where people work, study, or stay.

example.ex: There is ample car parking off site.
example.tran: 外面有很多地方可以停车。

trans: 原位；原位化；在现场；现场
基地选择；地点选择；选址；场所选择；厂址选择
站点管理；现场管理；中心管理；场地管理；网站管理
项目站点；施工现场；项目地址
施工现场；施工的地方；招聘网站；工地；求职网
地盘勘测；场地调查；场地勘察；现场勘查
总体设计；场地规划；地段规划；基地规划；场地设计
试验场；测试场地；试验点；试验场地；测试网站
活性部位；活性点；活性中心
